== Update for 16.04.4 point release ==

'''Upgrade from the 14.04 LTS is still problematic.''' Please install a fresh copy of 16.04.4 after running a backup of all your data. Download <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/xenial|here]]</nowiki>. 

Adding the '''Backports PPA''' will bring in the Plasma 5.8.8 bugfix upgrade. <nowiki>[[Read more about that here|https:--kubuntu.org-news-plasma-5-8-8-lts-and-krita-3-3-2-1-now-in-xenial-backports-ppa-]]</nowiki>

== Known Issues ==

* (Bug:1665385) Dragon player will not play .mp3/mp4 video with default Nouveau driver (even with kubuntu-restricted-extras installed). VLC plays fine with Nouveau driver. 

* The <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/libqapt/+bug/1530523|driver-manager bug]]</nowiki> lingers into this point release. To temporarily fix, in a Konsole do:

''sudo apt install apt-xapian-index && sudo update-apt-xapian-index''

=== General notes for 16.04 LTS ===

These release notes for '''Kubuntu 16.04 LTS''' (Xenial Xerus) provide an overview of the release and document the known issues with '''Kubuntu 16.04 LTS'''.

=== Support lifespan ===

Kubuntu 16.04 LTS will be <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Releases|supported for 3 years]]</nowiki>.

== 14.04 LTS to 16.04 LTS upgrade ==

'''WARNING''': LTS to LTS upgrade to Xerus is currently problematic and should not be attempted. Please install a fresh copy of 16.04 instead. To prevent messages about upgrading, change Prompt=lts to Prompt=normal or Prompt=never in the /etc/update-manager/release-upgrades file.
